title: Hotel prices hit roof amid AI summit
description: Hotel prices in the Capital have gone through the roof. With a major global Artificial Intelligence (AI) summit around the corner, New Delhi’s hospitality sector is witnessing one of its sharpest price surges in recent years.
content:

title: Bond Dealers Push Up BDC Trading Costs Amid Software Slide
description: Wall Street dealers are demanding higher compensation to trade corporate bonds issued by private credit funds, as investors turn squeamish about the funds’ exposure to software firms facing artificial intelligence disruption.
content:

title: Google turns to century-long bonds as AI infrastructure spending soars
description: Google parent Alphabet plans to raise about $20 billion, including rare 100-year bonds, as it ramps up massive spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure amid intense competition and mixed investor reactions.
content:
Google-parent Alphabet will issue bonds maturing in 100 years as it continues to invest massively in infrastructure for artificial intelligence, according to data published Tuesday by Bloomberg.

title: As head of the actors guild, Sean Astin brings a little Rudy, a little Samwise, and a lot of fight
description: Sean Astin has taken on the presidency of the SAG-AFTRA at a particularly perilous time for the actors union, and for Hollywood. content: Brokerage stocks posted steep declines on Tuesday, with Charles Schwab down 9%, LPL Financial down 10%, Raymond James Financial down 9% and Stifel Financial down 5%. Morgan Stanley slipped 4%, while Ameriprise Financial gave up about 7%. The move com... [1113 chars]

title: Blackstone Joins Anthropic Round, Raising Stake to $1 Billion
description: Blackstone Inc. is increasing its investment in artificial intelligence firm Anthropic PBC, elevating its stake to roughly $1 billion at the startup’s current valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Chile launches open-source AI model designed for Latin America
description: Chile has launched the first open-source AI language model trained on Latin American culture. Called Latam-GPT, the two-year effort is led by Chile's National Center of Artificial Intelligence and supported by over 30 institutions.
